events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that happened on 2024-04-30 evening, requesting immediate assistance for claim initiation.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords such as vehicle collision and damage noted in the claim.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer’s vehicle accident claim promptly.
The customer received an acknowledgment that the auto accident claim was received and is being processed.
The customer was asked to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a copy of the driving license.
All requested documents including photos of the accident scene and police report were submitted by the customer for review.
The insurance team has initiated an investigation to verify the details of the auto accident claim and assess damages.
The investigation concluded confirming the collision details, validating the claim and damage extent accurately.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and additional compensation was proposed to the claimant for approval.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the swift processing of the claim.
Following the positive feedback, the claim was approved officially to proceed with the payment for the accident damages.
Payment was successfully disbursed to the customer’s bank account covering all approved repair and related expenses.
The vehicle collision claim file was closed after all procedures were completed and payment was confirmed received.
The claim records and documentation were archived securely for future reference following standard retention policies.
